channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: You have failed to fix the first pothole which has grown to twice the size. A second hole has opened up beyond the first and it is growing each time it rains., 22nd September
item.description:
Near side Eastbound road outside Entrance to no 14 Greenhills Road . Two consecutive holes. This patch has had multiple repairs over the last two years including two patches on 21 and 24 February 2025. Why are Ringway allowed to do bad repairs which have to be revisited often?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Greenhills Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken furniture and bags full of rubbish dumped outside no 15 Russell Street., 22nd September
item.description:
Broken furniture and bags full of rubbish dumped outside no 15 Russell Street (other resident says that is not a firs time when rubbish appears outside that property. Maybe is worth it to have a word with people leaving at that property. Thanks .

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17, Russell Street, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Intimidating signage to deter people from using bridlepath, 22nd September
item.description:
The gate which is across the bridleway tells people thee is no unauthorised access it is deliberately trying to deter people from using the path. The works they refer to have stopped as far as I can see and no alternative route is offered by the landowner.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Colesbourne, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Barriers left behind by Contractors, 22nd September
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Way, Tewkesbury

item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor

item.title: Footpath has not been reinstated after ploughing., 22nd September
item.description:
On the footpath from School Road past the church. It’s a circular route where part is not walkable because of ploughing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Sunnyfield Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The pavement has disintegrated over our frontage at both the kerb and pavement edges with one kerb piece broken. the tarmac has largely disappeared and exposed the base material., 22nd September
item.description:
Directly outside 18 Oakhurst Rise

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Oakhurst Rise, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
